author: raghushantha
body:
AppxProvider is now rebranded as WSAProvider and is a [Public project on GitHub](https://github.com/PowerShell/WSAProvider).

This provider is supported only on Windows-Nano and is installable from PowerShellGallery

`Find-PackageProvider -Name WSAProvider`

Hence we do not need this codebase as part of PowerShell nor ship in PowerShell releases
title: Remove AppxProvider from PowerShell Codebase and builds
